name: NSKeyValueSetMutationKind
desc: The kinds of mutation that you can make to an unordered collection.

items.name: case union
items.desc: Indicates that observers in the specified set are being added to the observed object.

items.name: case minus
items.desc: Indicates that the observers in the specified set are being removed from the observed object.

items.name: case intersect
items.desc: Indicates that the observers not in the specified set are being removed from the observed object.

items.name: case set
items.desc: Indicates that a set of observers are replacing the existing objects in the observed object.
